SETS.query: Set of 3 products (A1, A2, A3) and 22 time periods (t1, t2,..., t22)

VARIABLES.name: x_it
VARIABLES.LaTeX: x_{i,t} \in \{0, 1\},  orall i \in I, t \in T
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable: 1 if product i is produced in period t

PARAMETERS.name: Cost_A1
PARAMETERS.description: Production cost per 100 kg for product A1

PARAMETERS.name: Cost_A2
PARAMETERS.description: Production cost per 100 kg for product A2

PARAMETERS.name: Cost_A3
PARAMETERS.description: Production cost per 100 kg for product A3

PARAMETERS.name: Quota_A1
PARAMETERS.description: Daily production quota for product A1

PARAMETERS.name: Quota_A2
PARAMETERS.description: Daily production quota for product A2

PARAMETERS.name: Quota_A3
PARAMETERS.description: Daily production quota for product A3

OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{t \in T} (P_i \cdot x_{i,t} - C_i \cdot x_{i,t} \cdot t_{i,t} - AC_i \cdot y_{i,t} - MB_i \cdot z_{i,t})
OBJECTIVE.description: Revenue from selling products minus production cost and activation cost, with binary variables to enforce minimum batch and activation time.
